description:
Retired seniors can learn how to use their job experience, hobbies, education and even their street smarts to create profitable home business ideas. Look for “Working From Home” or “Work from Home Business Ideas for Retired Seniors”

There are 16 tutorials included along with 4 FREE “How To” Home Business Manuals. Included are also free answers to email questions about your home business ideas (Limited to 3 free questions)  This course should take no more than a couple of hours of your time. The course uses powerpoint video and audio presentation. Downloads are in PDF format. Reports can also be emailed to you. (Your email WILL NOT be used for selling other products or services)

A recent  AARP study said that 17% of seniors who retire will start a business. Maybe you’ve always dreamed of running your own business.  Instead of golfing, traveling or just watching TV all day, these ideas and examples will help you create a business that will keep you mentally and financially activated.
title: Work from Home Ideas for Retired Seniors
